protein.specific_function: May be involved in a signaling pathway during male germ cell development or mature sperm function. Phosphorylates CREB1 on Ser-133 and stimulates downstream signaling

reference.reference_text: Chen X, Lin G, Wei Y, Hexige S, Niu Y, Liu L, Yang C, Yu L: TSSK5, a novel member of the testis-specific serine/threonine kinase family, phosphorylates CREB at Ser-133, and stimulates the CRE/CREB responsive pathway. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 2005 Aug 5;333(3):742-9.
